description: Validates git commit messages follow conventional commits format

hooks.prompt:
Validate git commit format.

Format: <type>[scope]: <description>
Types: feat|fix|docs|style|refactor|perf|test|build|ci|chore

Rules:
1. Valid type
2. Colon after type/scope
3. Description: lowercase, imperative, <72 chars, no period
4. Breaking: '!' or BREAKING CHANGE
5. UTF-8/multilingual OK

Check .claude/atomic-commits.local.md for validation_mode (strict/warning/off, default: warning) and custom_types.

Invalid:
- strict: {"hookSpecificOutput":{"permissionDecision":"deny","updatedInput":null},"systemMessage":"[reason]"}
- warning: {"hookSpecificOutput":{"permissionDecision":"allow","updatedInput":null},"systemMessage":"⚠️ [warning]"}

Valid: {"hookSpecificOutput":{"permissionDecision":"allow","updatedInput":null}}

Command: $TOOL_INPUT
